Name: Distributor Simulator
About the game: Distributor simulator is open world, third person game. You are company owner and here you have to buy goods al lowest possible price, load it to your car and deliver it to shops. Increase your level and unlock more contracts with other shops and Companys for different cargos. Buy trailers or bigger vehicles to increase load capacity and earn bigger profit. Plan routes to lower fuel costs. Simulator running in cycles. You will get different prices in every cycle. After some time you will notice what price is high, what price is low so you can buy more goods on cheap and store it in your warehouse for next delivery. Eventually became successful merchant and earn your first million. Features: -Physics based vehicles -Attachable trailers -Day night cycles -Dynamic weather -Dynamic economy *More content will be added with future updates.
